TUCSON, Ariz.-- Rep. Gabrielle Giffords is opening both eyes, moving both legs and arms and is responding to friends and family. Her doctors call it a`` major milestone'' in her recovery. We're hoping that she crosses through many more, said her neurosurgeon, Dr. Michael Lemole.
